abstract: The new government stress tests looming for the nation’s largest banks are already making Dick Kovacevich’s temples throb, Breakingviews says. The Wells Fargo chairman recently called the one-off health checks, which are intended to see if banks need more capital to weather a worsening economy, “asinine.”
lead_paragraph: The new government stress tests looming for the nation’s largest banks are already making Dick Kovacevich’s temples throb, Breakingviews says. The Wells Fargo chairman recently called the one-off health checks, which are intended to see if banks need more capital to weather a worsening economy, “asinine.”
